metadata.title: CVE-2021-38021 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in referrer in Google Chrome prior to96.0.4664.45 allowed a remote attacker to bypass navigation restrictionsvia a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
